screen_desc: The screenshot displays a home screen of a smartphone with various apps arranged in a grid layout. Notable apps include Google, Maps, Gmail, Play Store, and Zoom. The screen also shows a navigation bar at the bottom with options for recent apps, multitasking, and notifications.
action_think: The user requested to uninstall an app, but this screen does not display the app 'DoorDash - Food Delivery'. I should navigate to the app drawer to find and uninstall the app.
action_plan: Scroll up to access the app drawer
Find and select the DoorDash app
action_result: The last action of scrolling up has brought up the Google search bar, which is necessary to access the search function to find the DoorDash app for uninstallation.
